label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_026
content:

### Events
- Enabled prefetch coverage to 86% after adding two resolver POPs; monitored for unexpected upstream query spikes and saw none significant.
- Performed routine DNSSEC signature refresh verification; ensured RRSIG expiration lead time remains within policy window.
- Reviewed and pruned unused TSIG keys from key registry; removed 6 retired keys and updated access lists.
- Ran quarterly zone transfer test suite; confirmed AXFR/IXFR behavior and transfer ACLs across cloud endpoints.
